value:
select
src.lob_cd,
src.lob_desc,
src.mkt_lob_key,
src.mkt_lob_cd,
src.mkt_lob_desc,
src.mkt_lob_alt_val,
src.gbl_lob_key,
src.gbl_lob_desc,
src.gbl_lob_cd,
src.actv_rec_ind,
src.src_sys_cd, 
LKP_MAXSID.max_sid
from
(select
cast(b.fecu_lob_cd as VARCHAR(10)) as lob_cd,
b.fecu_lob_cd_desc as lob_desc,
a1.mkt_lob_key,
a1.mkt_lob_cd,
a1.mkt_lob_desc,
a1.mkt_lob_alt_val,
a1.gbl_lob_key,
a1.gbl_lob_desc,
a1.gbl_lob_cd,
'fecu' src_sys_cd,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind,
1 as dummy
from
(select 
--distinct 
fecu_lob_cd,fecu_lob_cd_desc,
row_number() over(partition by fecu_lob_cd order by fecu_report_date) as rowindex  
from
cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_lob ) b
left join  
(select 
cast('fecu' as VARCHAR(6)) src_sys_cd, 
ref_cd,
--cast(ref_desc as  VARCHAR(80)) as lob_desc,
cast(mkt_key as  INTEGER) as mkt_lob_key,
cast(mkt_ref_code as  VARCHAR(10)) as mkt_lob_cd,
cast(mkt_ref_code_desc as  VARCHAR(80)) as mkt_lob_desc,
cast(mkt_ref_code_alt_val as VARCHAR(50)) as mkt_lob_alt_val,
cast(gbl_key as INTEGER) as gbl_lob_key,
cast(gbl_ref_code as VARCHAR(10)) as gbl_lob_cd,
cast(gbl_ref_code_desc as VARCHAR(80)) as gbl_lob_desc
from cdp_stg_dwh.stg_tref_code_map_variant a  
where ref_type_cd='fecu_lob' and src_sys_cd='fecu')a1
on a1.ref_cd=b.fecu_lob_cd
where b.rowindex =1
) src
left outer join
(select 1 as dummy, max(dim_lob_key) as MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.dim_lob_t) LKP_MAXSID
on src.dummy = LKP_MAXSID.dummy
where lob_cd is not null
SELECT dim_lob_key,lob_cd,src_sys_cd FROM cdp_dwh.dim_lob_t where src_sys_cd='fecu';
